com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.step

Interface StepColumn

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Column

    public interface StepColumn
    A basic interface for wrapping user-defined and internally defined Columns

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color getBackground()
      Gets the background color of the column
      default List<String> getDataTags()
      Get data tags associated with the column

      Gets the column's description

      Gets the column name

      Get the index of the column
      StepOutput getStep()
      Gets the step associated with the column

      Gets a value for a given row in the column

      Set the background color of the column when displayed in the grid
